en.name: Chain Breaker
en.passiveDescription: For every party member from Natlan or who has a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the equipping character gains {{4.8//6//7.2//8.4//9.6%}} increased ATK. When there are no less than 3 of the aforementioned characters, the equipping character gains {{24//30//36//42//48}} Elemental Mastery.

zh.name: 碎链
zh.passiveDescription: 队伍中每有一名纳塔角色或与装备者元素类型不同的角色，装备者获得{{4.8//6//7.2//8.4//9.6%}}攻击力提升；上述角色不少于3名时，装备者的元素精通提升{{24//30//36//42//48}}点。
